channel.title: [Html?] Custom online status checker [Using custom images]

item.title: [Html?] Custom online status checker [Using custom images]
item.dc:creator: @tazay tazay
item.description:
@tazay wrote:

I came across this post on Google looking for a status checker with custom images. I found a website called www.statuschecker.info which seems like it would do what your after and it seems better then the escap-e.com one mentioned above as the image links and things are hidden instead of on show in the web link. Hope its of use!

Read full topic

item.title: [Html?] Custom online status checker [Using custom images]
item.dc:creator: @Eyfia Eyfia
item.description:
@Eyfia wrote:

Hello, is it possible a custom server status checker, that i can put in my smf forums?

I mean, i just need a html code or something that can do this:

I want it to automatically connect to my servers IP and Port and check if it’s online.
If it’s online it shows this picture: http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/2631/eyfiascapeonline.png
If offline, this one: http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/9025/eyfiascapeoffline.png

Can anyone please help me with this?

I also have a .php file with code like this:

[code]<?php

$ip = “eyfiascape.no-ip.org”;
$port= “43595”;
$online = ‘’;
$offline = ‘’;

if (! $sock = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $num, $error, 5))
{
echo “$offline”;
}
else
{
echo “$online”;
}

?>[/code]
But i don’t know where to put this… (Found it on one tutorial)
Maybe this could be useful?

Also! Well there is a website for that, here: http://status.escap-e.com

But when i do everything, it just shows me blank image like this:

Read full topic
item.source: [Html?] Custom online status checker [Using custom images]
